If a TPM chip senses that a system's integrity has been compromised by a virus or malware, it can start up in a quarantine mode to help fix the problem. <br>Hardware-based security, scan the BIOS for the unauthorized changes. <br>Provide a safe storage of encryption keys, certificates and passwords used for logging in to online services, which is safer than storing them inside software on the hard drive. <br>If a TPM senses the hard disk is moved to another location, as might be the case if it were stolen, it locks the system. <br>The TPM can enable BitLocker Drive encryption utility to run a series of conditional tests to see if it's safe to boot up. <br>The chip also enables smart-card readers, which certain companies require for user authentication and login. <br><h2> FAST & EASY CUSTOMIZABLE </h2>  It is always important to be able to continue your work at any time. There are also four USB 3.1 Gen 1 ports for connecting all your peripherals, and an HDMI-out port for connecting an extra external display. The extended recording frequency range greatly improves the accuracy of voice recognition when using Windows Cortana — even in noisy environments. Cortana is your clever personal assistant that can search the Web, find things on your PC, keep track of your calendar, or even tell you jokes. <br><h2> ZenAnywhere Easy and secure remote access </h2>  ASUS ZenAnywhere is an online service that gives you secure remote access to personal data and webcams via Vivo AiO V272. It even allows you to wake your Vivo AiO, put it in sleep mode, or shut it down — all remotely! Each stereo channel uses a pair of 3-watt speakers in a two-way design — just like you find in top-quality Hi-Fi speakers. A two-way speaker design uses two separate units working in perfect harmony: a small silk-domed speaker called a tweeter that is designed to deliver crystal-clear high frequencies, and a larger more robust speaker called a woofer that produces rich, powerful distortion-free bass. You really have to hear it to believe it! <br><h2> Connectivity Expand your viewing options </h2>  Zen AiO ZN270 has an HDMI-in port that lets you hook up video and audio from any device with an HDMI output, giving you an amazing big-screen experience for your laptop, mobile device, game console or even a set-top TV box! pinnacle of TV experience. Self-lit pixels allow truly spectacular picture quality and a whole host of design possibilities, while the latest cutting-edge technologies help deliver unprecedented levels of wonder. This is everything you love about TV — elevated in every way. <br><h2> Not all 8K is created equal. </h2>  100 million self-lit sub pixels make LG OLED TV the only way to see real 8K. Each pixel can be controlled individually to display unprecedented levels of depth and detail with infinite contrast and perfect blacks. LG OLED TVs set the standard for real 8K — LED TVs that claim to be 8K just can't quite reach this level of realism. <br><h2> What makes OLED unlike anything else? </h2>  The answer is self-lit pixels. A self-luminous display technology that gives you the ultimate viewing experience. Unlike LED TVs that are restricted by backlight technology, LG OLED TVs are capable of extreme realism and unique designs. <br><h2> SELF-LIT PiXELS. 100 million reasons to love OLED. </h2>  When it comes to picture quality, OLED beats LED hands down. That's because OLED has millions of self-lit pixels allowing for infinite contrast, 100% colour fidelity and the sharpest pixel-perfect details. The result is a viewing experience like no other. <br><h2> Infinite Contrast OLED puts LED in the shade. </h2>  Put simply, OLED has millions of self-lit pixels that can turn on and off to achieve perfect black and infinite contrast. That black is better than both mini-LED and LED TVs. So it doesn't matter how many thousands of backlights they have, LED TVs will still be in OLED's shadow. <br><h2> 100% Colour Fidelity OLED passes with flying colours </h2>  Renowned global testing agency Intertek has confirmed that LG OLED displays have 100% colour fidelity. This means that the colours you see on the screen closely match the colours of the original image. So everything you watch looks as the creator intended. <br><h2> LG OLED TV. A view found nowhere else. </h2>  If you're looking for the pinnacle of TV experience, look no further. Companies can address these computing challenges with the Samsung All-in-One Thin Client. These cloud displays typically cost less to purchase, support and power than conventional PCs and they support VDI platforms. VDI solutions, which deploy software on a server rather than at individual workstations, can be easier and more cost-effective to manage. The Samsung All-in-One Thin Client are all-in-one thin client displays that enable users to access data from a networked server. These optimized devices include an embedded Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (AMD) chipset, solid state drive (SSD) and RAM for full PC-like functionality. <br><h2> Decrease Threats with More Secure Data Storage and Scheduled Backups </h2>  Moving sensitive data from individual PCs to centralized servers reduces opportunities for unauthorized access. It also narrows the chances of viruses and malware spreading from one user to others. Using VDI technology, IT personnel can more easily follow standard best practices and meet regulatory requirements for data storage. VDI solutions also make it easier to perform regular backups, install security patches, detect potential problems and speed disaster recovery from one central location. <br><h2> Ergonomic Design </h2>  Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) allows you to gain access to secure desktop environments via a centrally managed data centre. Employees benefit from an excellent virtual desktop experience that can be remotely accessed from a broad range of authorised devices. VDI lowers costs, increases data security and control, and provides excellent support to a mobile workforce. It is ideal for both zero client and thin client configurations. <br><h2> What is VDI </h2>  Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) allows you to gain access to secure desktop environments via a centrally managed data centre. Employees benefit from an excellent virtual desktop experience that can be remotely accessed from a broad range of authorised devices. VDI lowers costs, increases data security and control, and provides excellent support to a mobile workforce. It is ideal for both zero client and thin client configurations.<p> <ul><li>Advanced VDI features</li><li>Higher performance with Dual-core SoC</li><li>Broad Compatibility With a Range of Virtualization Platforms</li><li>Centralized Data Storage and Scheduled Backups</li><li>Space-efficient Cloud Display</li></ul> </p> <DESCR_END> <OVERV_END>

Reflected light or glare can be very fatiguing to the eyes and reduces the contrast, colors and sharpness of the display. An anti-glare display makes viewing the display more pleasant for users, and reduces eyestrain. <br><h2> WIDE VIEWING ANGLES </h2>  The screen has a great monitor panel with an extremely wide viewing angle vertically as well horizontally of 178 degrees. The wide viewing angle allows you to have a consistent picture quality from any angle. <br><h2> NARROW VIEWING ANGLES </h2>  Traditional monitors have a limited viewing angle that prevents from seeing the content onscreen correct from all angels. When working together, it is more difficult to see the content. <br><h2> YOUR COMMERCIAL SUPPORTER </h2>  Equipped with one COM port and multiple USB ports, it will let you fully connect devices like barcode scanners, credit card readers, receipt printers etc. to make it an optimal cutting-edge platform for a variety of commercial projects. Altogether replacing existing commercial POS machines. <br><h2> EASY EXTENDIBILITY WITH HDD CADDY </h2>  With HDD Caddy you can install a second internal hard disk drive (HDD) into your PC rapidly when you need extra storage or your HDD crashes, so that you can always continue your work. First you just insert your own HDD in the HDD Caddy and second you replace your optical drive (DVD or Blu-ray drive) with the HDD Caddy. <br><h2> TPM: SECURE YOUR CONFIDENTIAL DATA </h2>  TPM uses a mix of software and hardware to protect any important passwords or encryption keys. If a TPM chip senses that a system's integrity has been compromised by a virus or malware, it can start up in a quarantine mode to help fix the problem. Hardware-based security, scan the BIOS for the unauthorized changes. Provide a safe storage of encryption keys, certificates and passwords used for logging in to online services, which is safer than storing them inside software on the hard drive. If a TPM senses the hard disk is moved to another location, as might be the case if it were stolen, it locks the system. The TPM can enable BitLocker Drive encryption utility to run a series of conditional tests to see if it's safe to boot up. The chip also enables smart-card readers, which certain companies require for user authentication and login. <br><h2> COUNTLESS OF SUCCESSFUL B2B PROJECTS </h2>  Over the past years, MSI has successfully supported Countless of commercial projects, including government tenders, restaurant & hotel facilitation, shopping mall navigation projects, school & university developments and professional office projects. <DESCR_END> <OVERV_END>

Across each of the apps, customers will appreciate full fidelity viewing of their Office documents, knowing edits and changes made on any device will render perfectly across all their devices. Tightly integrated with OneDrive, the Office Mobile apps are fully cloud connected, making it easy to access your documents from anywhere, pick up where you last left off, and co-author with others on documents and projects. Your docs are now automatically saved for you, ensuring you won’t lose a change and that others can see your edits as you work together. And there are new intelligent features, like Tell Me, that make it easier for you to do what you want in fewer steps. <br>Each of the Office Mobile apps is uniquely designed to help you be productive on the go. <br>Word - Word Mobile has the features you’d expect for touch-first productivity. All the core formatting commands, styles, fonts and spell check tools are there. You can easily share and co-author with other editors and utilize features like track changes and comments as you collaborate. We’ve also introduced some exciting features focused on mobility scenarios. For example, the Read mode is a new way to view documents: Word beautifully reflows your document to adapt to small screens and improve readability by adjusting font sizes and allowing you to zoom on charts and tables with a quick tap. Capture, organize and share your ideas with notebooks that you can access on any device. Type, write or draw and find your notes (even handwritten) with lightning fast search. Bring them to life with tags, tables and pictures, and share your notebooks to work with others at the same time. OneNote automatically saves your work and synchronizes changes made by everyone working in the notebook. OneNote is pre-installed on Windows 10, so simply go to the Start menu and tap the OneNote tile to get started.   <h2> Digitizer </h2>  Whichever model of Tablet PC you choose, it will have a digitizer of some type. The digitizer takes input from the input device and “tells” the computer its location on the screen. There are three different types of digitizer: the passive digitizer, the active digitizer, and the dual digitizer. <br><h2> Dual Digitizer </h2>  A dual digitizer employs both active and capacitive digitizer technologies. A capacitive digitizer senses the touch of a finger with very little pressure required to register an input. This relatively new technology is ideal for direct onscreen manipulation. A capacitive digitizer allows you to zoom, reduce and manipulate images and applications through the use of gestures. <br>A dual digitizer provides the ultimate computing experience by combining the accuracy of the active digitizer and the convenience and utility of a capacitive digitizer while allowing the user to seamlessly switch between the two.   <h2> Bluetooth® Wireless </h2>  The integrated Bluetooth® feature provides wireless connectivity for wireless devices at close proximity. For example, Bluetooth can be used to wirelessly transfer/ synchronize data to and from different devices such as PDAs and cellular phones. It also communicates with peripherals such as mice, keyboards, and printers wirelessly, minimizing the constraints and clutter of cables. The typical transfer distance for a Bluetooth device is up to 30 feet. Designed to take advantage of a typical workspace or PAN (Personal Area Network), the purpose of Bluetooth is to simplify the exchange of information and interfacing of devices within a close proximity. When considering Bluetooth devices keep in mind that the system as well as the individual devices must support Bluetooth.   <h2> Keyboard Cover </h2>  The optional keyboard cover extends the functionality of your STYLISTIC® tablet and turns it into a true 2-in-1 with a keyboard and touchpad.   <h2> Web Camera </h2>  The built-in web camera is a great way to stay in touch with your family, friends and business associates. The handy, versatile camera and its easy-to-use software let you take still pictures or capture video. Use the camera with any of the popular social networks to catch up with old friends and to meet new ones. Do you want to demonstrate a complex process to a colleague in another state? No problem. Do you have items you want to photograph to sell online? It’s a snap! Would you like to practice a speech for school and be able to review it? Use the video capture function to record it. Uses for the built-in camera are limited only by your imagination. The camera is located just above the display in the center along with the digital microphone and status indicator light that tells you when the camera is in use. <br><h2> Rear (World-Facing) Camera </h2>  The rear (world-facing) camera supports 5 MP resolution with auto-focus and an LED indicator. Excellent for taking photos and videos for projects and presentations.   <h2> USB 3.0 </h2>  Universal Serial Bus (USB) 3.0 ports allow you to connect USB devices. USB 3.0 technology is much faster than the previous generations of USB. USB 3.0 transfers data at up to 5Gbps and is backward-compatible with USB 1.1 and 2.0 devices, which transfer data at up to 12 Mbps and 480 Mbps, respectively. USB 3.0 ports can be distinguished from USB 1.1 and 2.0 ports by the blue “tongue” in the center of the port.   <h2> Absolute™ Data & Device Security (DDS) </h2>  Absolute DDS relies on patented Persistence® technology by Absolute. Persistence is embedded into the core of the computer or tablet device at the factory. Once activated, it provides you with a reliable two-way connection so you can confidently manage mobility, investigate potential threats, and take action if a security incident occurs. Persistence is built to detect when the Absolute DDS software agent has been removed. If the agent is missing, Persistence will ensure it automatically reinstalls even if the firmware is flashed, the device is re-imaged, the hard drive is replaced, or if the device is wiped clean to factory settings. No other technology can do this.   <h2> Quality and Reliability </h2>  The tight interaction between Fujitsu design, engineering, manufacturing and service support creates some of the highest quality products offered in the PC market. In a time when most PCs are assembled by third-party vendors, Fujitsu takes pride in its own world-class design and manufacturing capabilities. <DESCR_END> <OVERV_END>

A fan-less design also reduces downtime and increases the life-cycle of the All-in-One PC. <br><h2> DUAL LAN – ALWAYS BE YOUR BACKUP </h2>  With the Dual LAN Design, the PRO 16T will always be your backup and support the Internet/Intranet dual network environments. <br><h2> TPM: </h2>  <h2> SECURE YOUR CONFIDENTIAL DAT </h2>  TPM uses a mix of software and hardware to protect any important passwords or encryption keys. If a TPM chip senses that a system's integrity has been compromised by a virus or malware, it can start up in a quarantine mode to help fix the problem. <br>Hardware-based security, scan the BIOS for the unauthorized changes. <br>Provide a safe storage of encryption keys, certificates and passwords used for logging in to online services, which is safer than storing them inside software on the hard drive. <br>If a TPM senses the hard disk is moved to another location, as might be the case if it were stolen, it locks the system. <br>The TPM can enable BitLocker Drive encryption utility to run a series of conditional tests to see if it's safe to boot up. <br>The chip also enables smart-card readers, which certain companies require for user authentication and login. <br><h2> FAST & EASY CUSTOMIZABLE </h2>  It is always important to be able to continue your work at any time. If you need more memory or storage, it is swiftly and easily replaced. <br>With the HDD Caddy you can install a second internal hard disk in case you need more storage space if the HDD crashes so you can continue working. <br><h2> SEE MORE WITH ANTI-GLARE </h2>  The Anti-Glare display is designed to cut down the light that reflects off the display, so that you always have a great view of the screen, making it more pleasant to use. <br><h2> SEE MORE, DO MORE </h2>  With the VGA output ports, PRO 16T allows you to extend a second screen to pre-view your professional working data. <br>With the second display, PRO 16T allows you to increase working efficiency with more possibilities in a large variety of situations. <br><h2> VESA MOUNTABLE </h2>  Hook up the PRO 16T anywhere you’d like with its VESA mount support. Take it completely off your table/workspace, or mount it as a display. <br><h2> SAVE POWER, SAVE EARTH. </h2>  The PRO 16T equipped with Intel® dual-core processor which provides impressive multi-tasking performance. You’ll enjoy vivid, authentic images that evoke the emotion in every scene. <br><h2> Uncover the detail with 4K HDR </h2>  <br>A High Dynamic Range (HDR) compatible TV will change the way you look at TV. Combined with 4K Ultra HD resolution, HDR video content delivers exceptional detail, colour and contrast, with a far wider range of brightness than other video formats. The result is the most lifelike picture our TVs have ever been able to create, with brilliant highlights and fine detail. <br> <h2> Explore new worlds with Android TV </h2>  <br>Your smart TV just got smarter. The difference is clear with supremely lifelike detail, whatever you're watching. <br> <h2> This TV is recommended by Netflix </h2>  <br>Get a better streaming experience with a Netflix Recommended TV. Members will be able to enjoy more HDR content in the coming months. <br> <h2> Narrow aluminium frame </h2>  <br>The narrow aluminium frame helps the TV look slim and attractive, while focusing the eye on the screen for maximum entertainment. <br> <h2> Cable management </h2>  <br>Keep wires out of sight. All of your cables can be neatly arranged across the back of the TV and channelled into the stand, so everything looks tidy. <br> <h2> Cable-free front </h2>  <br>Hide all your cables from set-top boxes or Blu-ray players within the unique stand. <br> <h2> Motionflow XR keeps the action smooth </h2>  <br>Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow™ XR. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones. It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look. <br> <h2> Super Bit Mapping 4K HDR </h2>  <br>Super Bit Mapping 4K HDR creates a smoother, more natural picture by minimising its colour banding. With 14-bit powerful signal processing, it breaks up the solid bands of colour of an 8-bit or 10-bit source, up-converting to 14-bit equivalent gradation, with 64 times more colour levels. It delivers graceful reproduction of faces, sunsets and other areas of subtle colour gradation. <br> <h2> Object-based HDR remaster </h2>  <br>By analysing the objects in each scene individually, Object-based HDR remaster optimises and enhances colour and contrast. It brings everything you watch closer to the quality of HDR. Dark elements get darker, bright elements brighter and everything in between is more accurately lit, for realism in every scene never-before-possible on our TVs. <br> <h2> Say what you want to see with voice search </h2>  <br>Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for “romantic comedies” for example, brings up a list of suitable options. <br> <h2> Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices </h2>  <br>BRAVIA is Chromecast built-in ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube or Netflix from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA screen. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching. <br> <h2> DSEE restores detail to your digital music </h2>  <br>Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don’t always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel. <br> <h2> Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies </h2>  <br>BRAVIA uses a powerful computer model to analyse and compensate for inaccuracies in speaker response. It does this by ‘sampling’ the speaker frequency with higher precision. This information is fed back to cancel out any peaks or dips in the speaker’s natural response – resulting in pure, natural audio with smooth, even reproduction of all frequencies. <br> <h2> Cinematic S-Force Front Surround </h2>  <br>Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. S-Force Front Surround mimics the way the brain correlates sound sources to create proper volume, time lag, and sound wave spectrum – using only left and right speaker channels. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you’ll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area. <br> <h2> Experience the best in 4K UHD picture quality </h2>  <br>Our range of 4K UHD TVs deliver stunning picture quality and are compatible with the Digital Europe UHD requirements. <br> <h2> IR Blaster – control everything with one remote </h2>  <br>The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can also access an extensive library of on-demand content. Simply connect your BRAVIA to an aerial and broadband connection to get started with YouView. <br> <h2> Turn your TV into a digital recorder: USB HDD REC </h2>  <br>Store your favourite TV shows on an external USB hard disk drive to enjoy whenever you want. USB HDD REC allows one-touch and timer recording of a digital broadcast onto any USB HDD device up to 2TB in capacity. While viewing the show, simply press REC to start recording, which will automatically stop at the end of the programme. <br> <h2> Enjoy HDR gaming with PlayStation </h2>  <br>Sony’s 4K HDR televisions are perfect partners for PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 4 Pro consoles. This geyser heats up water extremely quickly saving a lot of time and effort in the process thus making it an extremely efficient machinery.. Amazing Features in a Semi-Transparent Body. The Venus Quik Q90 Tankless Geyser is fitted with a unique advanced heat exchanger that ensures continuous hot water supply in the most innovative way. A heat Exchanger transfers heat from one source to another. Here, the heating element and the pipes are moulded together and embedded in an aluminium block. The water enters and circulates through the pipes and gets heated by the heating element by quick transfer of heat from the aluminium block to the water in the pipes. This technology gives instantaneous water without direct contact between the element and water and so increases energy efficiency, lowers operating costs and ensures safety. FurthermoreIt works both in low and high pressure conditions depending upon your requirement.Along with unprecedented performance this geyser also provides bang for the buck performance due to its low and controlled electric consumption. This geyser heats up water extremely quickly wielding the 9.0 kW power.. Nice and Easy Usage. The all-new Venus Quik Q90 Tankless Geyser is easy to install. It can be fixed inside loft or above false ceilings and can be fixed vertically or horizontally, according to the space available. It operates at a working pressure of 6 Bars. The set and actual temperature are prominently displayed for easier and hassle free usage. This geyser also sports an LED digital display of outlet temperature for easier usage. If the unit detects electricity leakage, the electricity will be cut off by the leakage protector. The system adjusts heating power output to maintain the set temperature even when the water flow rate is altered. <DESCR_END> <OVERV_END>

The Profoto A1X AIRTTL-F Studio Light For Fujifilm Cameras was created for the professional photographer looking for portability and performance features or the ambitious non-professional who recognizes quality lighting but wants it comfortably and easily without the hassle of an overly technical interface. The A1X is easy to use. You can literally take it out of the box and start shooting. Weighing 1.2 lb including its battery, the A1X's sleek matte black finish not only appeals to the eye but to the tactile sense as well.. The first thing you'll notice about the A1X is its 2.75'''' round, tilting, rotating head, which is the physical feature most responsible for the A1X's natural-looking light with its soft gradual fall-off. The auto-zoom built into the head handles focal lengths from 32 to 105mm, while an optional Wide Lens gives you wide-angle coverage from 14 to 24mm. You can override the auto-zoom function at any time and make your adjustments manually. A filter kit with graduated CTO conversion filters and a fluorescent filter is also separately available to modify the unit's daylight color temperature.. The Profoto A1X AIRTTL-F Studio Light For Fujifilm Cameras recycles in 1 second, faster than most flash units in its class and has action-stopping flash durations from 1/800 to 1/20,000 second. The A1X supports HSS (High-Speed Sync) allowing you to shoot at shutter speeds as short a 1/8000 second instead of 1/250 to blur a distracting background using a wide aperture while controlling strong ambient light behind your subject. The 76Ws head has an LED modelling light that can give you a preview of how the light is falling on your subject. It can be turned on or off, set to automatically adjust proportionally to the power level selected, or just switched to manual where it can be modified by hand. All adjustments are indicated on the exceptionally readable white on black LCD display.. The Profoto A1X AIRTTL-F Studio Light For Fujifilm Cameras is powered by an included lithium-ion battery that has a capacity of 450 full power flashes (instead of the previous model's 350). Power is topped up on an exhausted battery in about 80 minutes with the included 100-240 VAC charger. The battery doesn't fade as its power is used, operating at peak performance until it's depleted. Purchase of an additional battery is recommended.. The Profoto A1X AIRTTL-F Studio Light For Fujifilm Cameras can be used on-camera as well as off-camera, and it really earns its name as a ''''Studio Light.'''' The flash has a built-in transceiver that allows it to be used with other A1s, B2s or D2, B1, and B1X monolights. All the Air Remote wireless controllers can trigger the A1X at distances up to 1000' and the Air Sync will give you simple wireless triggering, while the Air Remote will let you wirelessly adjust power, grouping, channel selection, and modelling light on/off. It's the Air Remote TTL that allows you to explore and control the A1X's full capabilities. It wirelessly allows assignment of channels and groups as well as TTL and power level. In fact, the A1 has a switch that allows you to set your main light to TTL, switch to manual operation to adjust manual units in other groups to ratio their output, then switch back to TTL and return to the original TTL setting which was stored for you. The A1X also has +/-3 stops of exposure compensation that can be modified from the remote for your specific needs. <DESCR_END> <OVERV_END>

You’ll enjoy vivid, authentic images that evoke the emotion in every scene. <br><h2> Uncover the detail with 4K HDR </h2>  A High Dynamic Range (HDR) compatible TV will change the way you look at TV. Combined with 4K Ultra HD resolution, HDR video content delivers exceptional detail, colour and contrast, with a far wider range of brightness than other video formats. The result is the most lifelike picture our TVs have ever been able to create, with brilliant highlights and fine detail. <br><h2> Rediscover every detail with 4K X-Reality™ PRO </h2>  Discover a thrilling world of extraordinary clarity with every single pixel enhanced beautifully. The difference is clear with supremely lifelike detail, whatever you're watching. <br><h2> Explore new worlds with Android TV™ </h2>  Your smart TV just got smarter. Enjoy many of your favourite smartphone and tablet experiences on a big, beautiful BRAVIA™ screen. Android TV™ with advanced voice control lets you connect and access content, from movies and TV shows to thousands of apps, simply by talking. <br><h2> Narrow aluminium frame  </h2>  The narrow aluminium frame helps the TV look slim and attractive, while focusing the eye on the screen for maximum entertainment. <br><h2> Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth </h2>  Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow™ XR. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones. It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look. <br><h2> Cable-free front </h2>  Hide all your cables from set-top boxes or Blu-ray players within the unique stand. <br><h2> Cable management </h2>  Keep wires out of sight. All of your cables can be neatly arranged across the back of the TV and channelled into the stand, so everything looks tidy. <br><h2> Say what you want to see with voice search </h2>  Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV™ provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for “romantic comedies” for example, brings up a list of suitable options. <br><h2> Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR </h2>  Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR creates a smoother, more natural picture by minimising its colour banding. With 14-bit powerful signal processing, it breaks up the solid bands of colour of an 8-bit or 10-bit source, up-converting to 14-bit equivalent gradation, with 64 times more colour levels. It delivers graceful reproduction of faces, sunsets and other areas of subtle colour gradation. <br><h2> Object-based HDR remaster </h2>  By analysing the objects in each scene individually, Object-based HDR remaster optimises and enhances colour and contrast. It brings everything you watch closer to the quality of HDR. Dark elements get darker, bright elements brighter and everything in between is more accurately lit, for realism in every scene never-before-possible on our TVs. <br><h2> Google Play™: A world of content and apps </h2>  Discover movies and TV shows, games and much more from Google Play™. Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps on your TV in a brand new way. <br><h2> Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices </h2>  BRAVIA™ is Chromecast built-in ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube™ or Netflix from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA™ screen.2 You can cast from Android™, iOS™, or your laptop. <br><h2> Content Bar: find everything fast </h2>  The unobtrusive content bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you’re looking for. Call up the Content bar and you can keep watching, while you scan through live TV, videos on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first.  <br><h2> Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies </h2>  BRAVIA™ uses a powerful computer model to analyse and compensate for inaccuracies in speaker response. It does this by ‘sampling’ the speaker frequency with higher precision. This information is fed back to cancel out any peaks or dips in the speaker’s natural response – resulting in pure, natural audio with smooth, even reproduction of all frequencies. <br><h2> Made to listen: ClearAudio+ </h2>  Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching. <br><h2> DSEE restores detail to your digital music </h2>  Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don’t always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel. <br><h2> Turn your TV into a digital recorder: USB HDD REC </h2>  Store your favourite TV shows on an external USB hard disk drive to enjoy whenever you want. USB HDD REC allows one-touch and timer recording of a digital broadcast onto any USB HDD device up to 2TB in capacity. While viewing the show, simply press REC to start recording, which will automatically stop at the end of the programme. <br><h2> Cinematic S-Force Front Surround </h2>  Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. S-Force Front Surround mimics the way the brain correlates sound sources to create proper volume, time lag, and sound wave spectrum – using only left and right speaker channels. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you’ll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area. <br><h2> Experience the best in 4K UHD picture quality </h2>  Our range of 4K UHD TVs deliver stunning picture quality and are compatible with the Digital Europe UHD requirements. <DESCR_END> <OVERV_END>

Hotel managers do not have to set up each individual TVs with USB Cloning. They can easily store the settings from one TV on a USB device and then clone those settings onto other TVs. Connect Share Media entertainment including movies, music, and images come alive on the screen by simply plugging a USB drive directly into the TV. Software Clock Allow your guests to check the current time on the TV whenever needed. Software Clock is a clock display solution of in-room TVs using a remote control. The guests can easily check the time with the press of ‘Info’ button using the remote control, even when the TV is off. Security Mode The HC770 Series displays provide unique and strong display content management with Security Mode. Using this feature, you can disable critical functions of the displays to easily prevent changes to the displays' settings. You can also block non-compliant content or the transmission of unwanted Teletext (TTX) with a signal to maintain complete control of content on guest room displays, including input through HDMI® and USB ports. This feature is also highly beneficial for controlling displays in environments that require tight security, such as prisons. 72-hour clock backup Help guests easily keep track of time with a reliable clock. First you just insert your own HDD in the HDD Caddy and second you replace your optical drive (DVD or Blu-ray drive) with the HDD Caddy. <br><h2> TPM: SECURE YOUR CONFIDENTIAL DATA </h2>  <br>TPM uses a mix of software and hardware to protect any important passwords or encryption keys. If a TPM chip senses that a system's integrity has been compromised by a virus or malware, it can start up in a quarantine mode to help fix the problem. <br>- Hardware-based security, scan the BIOS for the unauthorized changes. - If a TPM senses the hard disk is moved to another location, as might be the case if it were stolen, it locks the system. - The chip also enables smart-card readers, which certain companies require for user authentication and login. - Provide a safe storage of encryption keys, certificates and passwords used for logging in to online services, which is safer than storing them inside software on the hard drive. - The TPM can enable BitLocker Drive encryption utility to run a series of conditional tests to see if it's safe to boot up. <br><h2> COUNTLESS OF SUCCESSFUL B2B PROJECTS </h2>  <br>Over the past years, MSI has successfully supported Countless of commercial projects, including government tenders, restaurant & hotel facilitation, shopping mall navigation projects, school & university developments and professional office projects.<p> <ul><li>No OS</li><li>Intel Celeron N4000 (4MB Cache, 1.1GHz)</li><li>49.5 cm (19.5-inch) HD+ 1600 x 900</li><li>8GB DDR4-SDRAM & 256GB SSD</li></ul> </p> <DESCR_END> <OVERV_END>

If a TPM chip senses that a system's integrity has been compromised by a virus or malware, it can start up in a quarantine mode to help fix the problem. <br>- Hardware-based security, scan the BIOS for the unauthorized changes. - If a TPM senses the hard disk is moved to another location, as might be the case if it were stolen, it locks the system. - The chip also enables smart-card readers, which certain companies require for user authentication and login. - Provide a safe storage of encryption keys, certificates and passwords used for logging in to online services, which is safer than storing them inside software on the hard drive. - The TPM can enable BitLocker Drive encryption utility to run a series of conditional tests to see if it's safe to boot up. <br><h2> COUNTLESS OF SUCCESSFUL B2B PROJECTS </h2>  <br>Over the past years, MSI has successfully supported Countless of commercial projects, including government tenders, restaurant & hotel facilitation, shopping mall navigation projects, school & university developments and professional office projects.<p> <ul><li>Windows 10 Home 64-bit</li><li>Intel Pentium Silver N5000 (4MB Cache, 1.1GHz)</li><li>49.5 cm (19.5-inch) HD+ 1600 x 900</li><li>4GB (2133MHz) DDR4-SDRAM & 1000GB HDD</li></ul> </p> <DESCR_END> <OVERV_END>

Dolby Digital can provide sound with 5 channels and subwoofer. With Dolby Digital+, two additional channels refine the sound by adding more detail and creating an impressive surround sound. <br><h2> Dolby Atmos </h2>  Welcome to a powerful world of sound that redefines surround sound: with Dolby Atmos, the sounds seem to flow in space around you, breathtakingly real. With DTS-HD, you can use them to enhance your listening experience. <br><h2> DTS Virtual:X </h2>  Entertainment at the highest acoustic level: DTS Virtual:X creates the feeling of sound above your head height. It also improves the clarity of dialogue and enhances the bass sound. Just sit back and let your TV speakers deliver an unprecedented audio experience. <br><h2> HDMI Inputs </h2>  Plug it in, ready, go: with HDMI inputs you can connect all kinds of devices –Blu-ray or DVD players, streaming boxes, digital receivers or game consoles. With this standard you can take advantage of optically high-quality HDR content, which broadcasters or streaming providers transmit by satellite, cable or antenna. <br><h2> Android TV Remote Control app </h2>  Remote control? Items not suitable for washing in the dishwasher:. 1. Never wash dishes soiled by cigarette ash, candle remnants, polish, dyestuff, chemicals, etc. in your dishwasher.. 2. Do not wash silverware and cutlery with wooden or bone stems, glued pieces, or pieces that are not resistant to heat, as well as copper and tin-plated containers in the dishwasher.. 3. Decorated glasses and decorated lustre porcelains are not suitable for washing in the dishwasher. Manufacturers of some glassware and porcelain tableware items do not recommend washing such kitchen utensils in the dishwashers either.. 4. Kitchen utensils that contain or are made of aluminium should not be washed in the dishwasher.. 5. Metal items particularly such as knives are used for purposes other than their intended uses. Protective cover on the edges of knives may get damaged when they are used for purposes such as opening cans. Do not use metal kitchen utensils out of their intended uses.. 6. Cutlery made of low-quality stainless steel. Corrosion on such items is inevitable; they should not be washed in dishwashers. <DESCR_END> <OVERV_END>

Neutral density filters do not affect the coloration of the image and the 3.0 density provides a 10 stop reduction in light from entering the lens. By using neutral density filter the camera is vulnerable to infrared light which will cast the unwanted red colour to the photos when shooting at small aperture. The added the infrared protection coating layer to this filter which help to eliminate the infrared light through the lens to bring back the natural colour.. Extra-Ordinary Usage. The NiSi ND1000 55 mm Nano IR Neutral Density Filter also can enable greater motion blurring and image detail by allowing a large aperture and/or a slow shutter speed to be used. A variant on the ND filter is the graduated ND, in which there is a gradient that effects the reduction of light in a graduated, neutral level from 100% to 0% across the length of the filter. The Graduated ND is recommended for shooting landscapes and seascapes, because you can reduce the brightness of the sky (for better contrast) but still maintain an affecting exposure of the land or water. Easily soluble liquid that avoids detergent residue on clothes and on machine parts. Low foaming formulation specially developed for front loading washing machines.. Bleach and phosphate free that ensures clothes are not damaged and is also environment friendly. pH-balanced formula helps preserve the natural softness and shine of your clothes, even after repeated washes. Delivers superior wash performance in front loader washing machines without affecting their parts. . Move away from ordinary detergents that cause excessive foaming, which affects the wash quality and also causes damage to the machine. Instead, bring in the IFB Essentials Fluff Liquid Detergent for Top Load Washing Machines is a low-foam, liquid, laundry detergent, especially developed to deliver superior wash performance in a top loading washing machine without damaging its parts. Unlike the average ordinary detergents, the IFB Essentials Fluff Liquid Detergent for Top Load Washing Machines does not leave any form of particle residues on the machine parts or on the clothes. The pH balance formula is created to help preserve the natural shine and softness of the clothes.. The IFB Essentials Fluff Liquid Detergent for Top Load Washing Machines is phosphate free and hence does not damage clothes or washing machine it is also environment friendly. The low-foam, liquid, laundry detergent is specially developed to deliver superior wash performance for a top loader washing machine. This is done to ensure that no parts of the machine are damaged. The Fluff detergent is environmentally friendly and is ideally suitable for white as well as color fabrics. The procedure to use the detergent is fairly simple, 1 cap of the liquid amounts to 40ml. So, for regular wash load 1 cap is sufficient, for delicate clothes 20ml is sufficient. Whereas, in the case of heavily soiled loads, use 1 and a half cap of detergent for best cleaning results. <DESCR_END> <OVERV_END>

It comes with other sensors like 360 Degree Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, E Compass, Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Side-mounted Fingerprint Scanner. The smartphone features a striking screen that gives you a 6.67-inch FHD Plus Super AMOLED Display. The resolution is 2400 x 1080 pixels. It comes with a 120 Hz Refresh rate. This display offers ultra-smooth clarity defining every detail. The screen comes with Corning Gorilla Glass 5 protection which protects your device from unexpected falls and unwanted scratches.. The Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro features a brilliant combination of 64 MP (primary camera), 8 MP (ultra-wide angle camera), 5 MP (super macro), and 2 MP (depth sensor). The rear camera photography features include HDR, Night Mode 2.0, Magic Clone Photos, Long Exposure. The rear camera video features are Vlog Mode, Dual Video, Magic Clone Videos, Short video, Ultra-wide angle video recording, FHD Macro video recording, 960 fps slow-motion video, Rear camera video Beautify, Time-lapse photography, Pro video mode. The 16 MP front camera offers more natural and personalized options, delivering stunning selfies. The front camera photography features are Night mode, Panorama, Beautify, Portrait. deep black and natural colour. Over 8 million self-illuminating pixels are precisely and individually controlled by the X1 Extreme™ processor. Sony's OLED TV creates exquisite, unprecedented contrast that reveals more detail in shadows and more depth in every scene. <br><h2> Acoustic Surface™ technology </h2>  <br>Unlike most TV speakers, sound comes to you from the entire screen, immersing you in exciting new entertainment experiences. Two actuators behind the TV vibrate the screen to create sound that's truly engaging. It's pictures and sound in perfect harmony.  <br><h2> 4K HDR Processor X1™ Extreme: So real you can feel it </h2>  <br>Made to enhance the latest generation of 4K HDR pictures, the 4K HDR Processor X1™ Extreme brings reality to every scene. With 40% more real-time image processing than our renowned 4K Processor X1™, it delivers unprecedented picture quality for everything you watch, upscaling content from any source nearer to 4K HDR quality. <br><h2> Uncover the detail with 4K HDR </h2>  <br>This TV pairs the brilliance of 4K clarity with the brightness, colour and detail of High Dynamic Range (HDR) and can handle a variety of HDR formats, including HDR10, Hybrid Log-Gamma and Dolby Vision™. <br><h2> TRILUMINOS™ Display: Extra colours, extra brilliance </h2>  <br>More colours means more realism. A TRILUMINOS™ Display selectively maps colours across a wider gamut, ensuring subtle colours do not become oversaturated and appear naturally on screen. You’ll enjoy vivid, authentic images that bring out the emotion in every scene. <br><h2> Rediscover every detail with 4K X-Reality™ PRO </h2>  <br>Discover a thrilling world of extraordinary clarity. Every single pixel is enhanced beautifully by our most powerful 4K picture processing technology ever. Individual parts of each scene are analysed and matched with a special image database that independently addresses texture, contrast, colour and edges. The difference is clear with supremely lifelike detail, whatever you're watching. <br><h2> Explore new worlds with Android TV™ </h2>  <br>Your smart TV just got smarter. Enjoy many of your favourite smartphone and tablet experiences on a big, beautiful BRAVIA™ screen. Android TV™ with advanced voice control lets you connect and access content, from movies and TV shows to thousands of apps, simply by talking. <br><h2> This TV is recommended by Netflix </h2>  <br>Get a better streaming experience with a Netflix Recommended TV. A Netflix Recommended TV is chosen for its high performance, cutting edge smart features and easy app access. And also, you can watch Marco Polo in 4K HDR today, with a premium Netflix subscription. Members will be able to enjoy more HDR content in the coming months.  <br><h2> Clean rear look </h2>  <br>Easily manage all your cables, keeping wires hidden in the cover.  <br><h2> Beautiful picture in any style </h2>  <br>Made to fit your lifestyle beautifully, on the TV stand or wall mounting.  <br><h2> Maximises the viewing area </h2>  <br>The screen is edged with a slim, narrow, 4-sided frame that maximises the viewing area. <br><h2> Designed to focus on the picture </h2>  <br>No distractions, a stand-less body lets you focus on the screen. <br><h2> Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth </h2>  <br>Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow™ XR. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones. It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look. <br><h2> Object-based HDR remaster </h2>  <br>By analysing the objects in each scene individually, Object-based HDR remaster optimises and enhances colour and contrast. It brings everything you watch closer to the quality of HDR. Dark elements get darker, bright elements brighter and everything in between is more accurately lit, for never-before-possible realism in every scene. <br><h2> Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR </h2>  <br>Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR creates a smoother, more natural picture by minimising its colour banding. With 14-bit powerful signal processing, it breaks up the solid bands of colour of an 8-bit or 10-bit source, up-converting to 14-bit equivalent gradation, with 64 times more colour levels. It delivers graceful reproduction of faces, sunsets and other areas of subtle colour gradation. <br><h2> Dual database processing </h2>  <br>The 4K HDR Processor X1™ Extreme has two imaging databases that work together in real time to improve your picture. By searching through thousands of picture patterns in Sony-exclusive databases for noise reduction and super-resolution, they remove unwanted noise and upscale every image to the clarity of 4K, so you can enjoy incredible picture quality no matter the source. <br><h2> Say what you want to see with voice search </h2>  <br>Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV™ provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for “romantic comedies” for example, brings up a list of suitable options.7 <br><h2> Content Bar: find everything fast </h2>  <br>The unobtrusive content bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you’re looking for. Call up the Content bar and you can keep watching, while you scan through live TV, videos on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first.  <br><h2> Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices </h2>  <br>BRAVIA™ is Chromecast built-in ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube™ or Netflix from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA™ screen.8 You can cast from Android™, iOS™, or your laptop.  <br><h2> Google Play™: A world of content and apps </h2>  <br>Discover movies and TV shows, games and much more from Google Play™. Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps on your TV in a brand new way. <br><h2> Made to listen: ClearAudio+ </h2>  <br>Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching. <br><h2> DSEE restores detail to your digital music </h2>  <br>Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don’t always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel. <br><h2> Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies </h2>  <br>BRAVIA™ uses a powerful computer model to analyse and compensate for inaccuracies in speaker response. It does this by ‘sampling’ the speaker frequency with higher precision. This information is fed back to cancel out any peaks or dips in the speaker’s natural response – resulting in pure, natural audio with smooth, even reproduction of all frequencies. <br><h2> Cinematic S-Force Front Surround </h2>  <br>Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. S-Force Front Surround mimics the way the brain correlates sound sources to create proper volume, time lag, and sound wave spectrum – using only left and right speaker channels. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you’ll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area. <br><h2> Experience the best in 4K UHD picture quality </h2>  <br>Our range of 4K UHD TVs deliver stunning picture quality and are compatible with the Digital Europe UHD requirements. <br><h2> Turn your TV into a digital recorder: USB HDD REC </h2>  <br>Store your favourite TV shows on an external USB hard disk drive to enjoy whenever you want. USB HDD REC allows one-touch and timer recording of a digital broadcast onto any USB HDD device up to 2TB in capacity. While viewing the show, simply press REC to start recording, which will automatically stop at the end of the programme. <br><h2> IR Blaster – control everything with one remote </h2>  <br>The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your Set-top box (cable box) with the TV remote controller. <br><h2> YouView: the best of catch-up and on-demand TV </h2>  <br>With YouView built-in, you can scroll back up to seven days to watch shows from BBC iPlayer, ITV Hub, All 4 and Demand 5. You can also access an extensive library of on-demand content. Simply connect your BRAVIA™ to an aerial and broadband connection to get started with YouView. <br><h2> Transform your viewing with dramatic imaging </h2>  <br>Bring scenes to life with striking highlights, deeper darks and vibrant colours. Dolby Vision is an HDR solution that creates an immersive, engaging cinematic experience in your home. <br><h2> Enjoy HDR gaming with PlayStation® </h2>  <br>Sony’s 4K HDR televisions are perfect partners for PlayStation®4 and PlayStation®4 Pro consoles. Immerse yourself in a responsive, fun-filled gaming experience with vivid textures and intensely vibrant colours. See your favourite games come to life with the incredible picture quality. <DESCR_END> <OVERV_END>

With a micro-USB connector on one end and a USB 3.0 connector on the other, the drive lets you move content easily between your devices-from your AndroidTM smartphone or tablet to your laptop, PC or Mac computer1. The USB 3.0 connector is high-performance and backward-compatible with USB 2.0 ports. The SanDisk Memory Zone app2 for Android (available on Google Play) helps you manage your device's memory. Technical :  Interface: Interface: micro-USB and USB 3.0 connectors Operational temperature: 32° - 113° F (0° – 45° C) Storage temperature: 50° - 158° F (-10° – 70° C) Compatibility: USB 3.0 (backward compatible with USB 2.0) Automatically-detected when connected to an OTG-enabled smartphone or tablet. Requires Android smartphone or tablet with On-The-Go (OTG) compatibility. Temperature of USB drives during use: What are the temperature standards for USB drives? Temperature testing: SanDisk USB drives are designed using the Safety of Information technology Equipment, IEC 60950-1 as guidance. Many countries, including the United States, Canada, Europe, Australia and New Zealand, have adopted this safety standard. In accordance with this guidance, SanDisk USB drives are tested to operate within acceptable ambient temperature ranges (0º C and 25º C). Our drives are also tested in an extended temperate range and will operate in environments between 25º and 45º C. Factors that may increase drive temperature during use · External environment & host device In environments that are on the higher end of the tested temperature range, such as 25 º C - 45º C, it is normal for the temperature of your flash drive to increase. The exterior of the drive functions as a cooling surface that transfers heat from inside the drive to the cooler air outside. If the temperature of the ambient environment is high or if the temperature of your host devices (such as your laptop which can also generate heat) is high, the drive will release heat in a less efficient manner. It is normal for the drive to be warmer in these circumstances than it would be if the ambient environment or host device was cooler. · Large file transfers & extended usage An increase in drive temperature is also normal if you are using your flash drive to transfer large files or multiple files. Large file transfers may take an extended period of time to complete and can require more energy than a small file transfer. Multiple file transfers that are completed over a short period of time can generate a similar amount of energy. During these drive operations, the interior temperature of the drive increases and the drive will release more heat through the drive's exterior in order to complete the data transfer. · USB drives with metal material Metal absorbs more heat than plastic materials. Metal also releases heat when touched at a faster rate and may feel hot as compared to drives made out of plastic materials that are being used in the same way. SanDisk iXpand flash drive, SanDisk Ultra Fit USB, SanDisk Ultra Flair USB, SanDisk Ultra USB Type-C, Cruzer Force USB and SanDisk Extreme PRO USB flash drive products all incorporate more metal material than other SanDisk USB drives. Any of the above factors may result in your drive running warm, if you experience this and find the elevated temperature to be uncomfortable, please consider waiting 10-15 seconds after your transfer is complete to remove/eject the drive. Note: Incase of any issue with the product, Kindly contact brand at 1800-102-2055(English, Hindi) between M-F , 9a.m - 7:30p.m. <DESCR_END> <OVERV_END>

Because objects are remastered individually, this TV can reproduce greater depth, textures and more realistic pictures. <br><h2> Beautifully matched pictures and sound </h2>  Sound on conventional TVs with a speaker located below the screen is often out of sync with the picture. First you just insert your own HDD in the HDD Caddy and second you replace your optical drive (DVD or Blu-ray drive) with the HDD Caddy. <br><h2> TPM: SECURE YOUR CONFIDENTIAL DATA </h2>  <br>TPM uses a mix of software and hardware to protect any important passwords or encryption keys. If a TPM chip senses that a system's integrity has been compromised by a virus or malware, it can start up in a quarantine mode to help fix the problem. <br>- Hardware-based security, scan the BIOS for the unauthorized changes. - If a TPM senses the hard disk is moved to another location, as might be the case if it were stolen, it locks the system. - The chip also enables smart-card readers, which certain companies require for user authentication and login. - Provide a safe storage of encryption keys, certificates and passwords used for logging in to online services, which is safer than storing them inside software on the hard drive. - The TPM can enable BitLocker Drive encryption utility to run a series of conditional tests to see if it's safe to boot up. <br><h2> COUNTLESS OF SUCCESSFUL B2B PROJECTS </h2>  <br>Over the past years, MSI has successfully supported Countless of commercial projects, including government tenders, restaurant & hotel facilitation, shopping mall navigation projects, school & university developments and professional office projects.<p> <ul><li>Windows 10 Pro</li><li>Intel Celeron N4000 (4MB Cache, 1.1GHz)</li><li>49.5 cm (19.5-inch) HD+ 1600 x 900</li><li>4GB (2400MHz) DDR4-SDRAM (1 x 4) & 500GB HDD, 32GB SSD</li></ul> </p> <DESCR_END> <OVERV_END>

The Think lite TTL Camera Flash TT685 applies to Sony DSLR series cameras and is compliant with TTL auto flash. This feature ensures that your shooting endeavour gets simpler and hassle-free.Prime FeaturesGodox Flash Light TT685S (Black) offers 2 transmitting styles that ensure that you get creative light effects while shooting. Equipped with optic transmission, even illumination and a stable output are both guaranteed. Additionally, 2.4G wireless transmission is coupled with all-in-one functionalities. Moreover, 100 meters further transmission and you have a winner in your hands. As master flash, Godox Flash Light TT685S (Black) controls Sony speed lights like A77II, A7RII, A7R a58, A99, ILCE6000L etc. in TTL or manual mode. As slave flash, it can receive signals of Sony speed lites like A77II, A7RII, A7R a58, A99, ILCE6000L etc.Godox Flash Light TT685S (Black) also ensures full compatibility to TTL functionalities like HSS (max. 1/8000s), FEC, front and rear curtain sync, modelling flash etc. For a superior user experience, the TTL wireless flash trigger X1T-S offered additionally is a superb feature. With 2.4G wireless transmission, X1T-S can be used to manoeuvre camera flash, studio flash and camera shutter over a distance of 100 meters. In addition, features like TTL auto flash compatibility, 1/8000s High-speed sync, Flash exposure compensation, Flash exposure lock that locks into the hot shoe like a sony flash, modelling flash etc. are a sure added plus.Added features Godox Flash Light TT685S (Black) offers the Dot-matrix LCD panel for easy and convenient operation. Added features are GN60, 0.1-2.6s recycle time on an average and 230 full power flashes.
